verses.verse: וַיָּ֕שָׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov with me came again הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <WH4397> ham-mal-'Ach And the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֑י Bi; וַיְעִירֵ֕נִי <WH5782> vay-'i-Re-ni and waked כְּאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> ke-'Ish me as a man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who יֵע֥וֹר <WH5782> ye-'or that is wakened מִשְּׁנָתֽוֹ׃ <WH8142> mish-she-na-To. out of his sleep

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me מָ֥ה <WH4100> mah What אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah I רֹאֶ֑ה <WH7200> ro-'Eh; unto me What seest; וַיֹּאמֶר vai-yo-mer כוָאֹמַ֡ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar said קרָאִ֣יתִי׀ <WH7200> ra-'I-ti I have looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold מְנוֹרַת֩ <WH4501> me-no-Rat and behold a candlestick זָהָ֨ב <WH2091> za-Hav all [of] gold כֻּלָּ֜הּ <WH3605> kul-Lah all וְגֻלָּ֣הּ <WH1543> ve-gul-Lah bowl עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹאשָׁ֗הּ <WH7218> ro-Shah, upon the top וְשִׁבְעָ֤ה <WH7651> ve-shiv-'Ah of it and his seven נֵרֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5216> ne-ro-Tei-ha lamps עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha, on שִׁבְעָ֤ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah thereon and seven וְשִׁבְעָה֙ <WH7651> ve-shiv-'Ah to the seven מֽוּצָק֔וֹת <WH4166> mu-tza-Kot, pipes לַנֵּר֖וֹת <WH5216> lan-ne-Rot lamps אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- are on רֹאשָֽׁהּ׃ <WH7218> ro-Shah. which [are] upon the top

וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim And two זֵיתִ֖ים <WH2132> zei-Tim olive trees עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha; and אֶחָד֙ <WH259> 'e-Chad by it one מִימִ֣ין <WH3225> mi-Min upon the right הַגֻּלָּ֔ה <WH1543> hag-gul-Lah, [side] of the bowl וְאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> ve-'e-Chad and the other עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on שְׂמֹאלָֽהּ׃ <WH8040> se-mo-Lah. upon the left

וָאַ֙עַן֙ <WH6030> va-'A-'an So I answered וָֽאֹמַ֔ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar, and spake אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <WH4397> ham-mal-'Ach to the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֖י bi לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; with me saying מָה־ <WH4100> mah- What אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh are these אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> 'a-do-Ni. master

וַ֠יַּעַן <WH6030> Vai-ya-'an with me answered הַמַּלְאָ֞ךְ <WH4397> ham-mal-'Ach Then the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> had-do-Ver that talked בִּי֙ bi וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, about הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo No יָדַ֖עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ta unto me Knowest מָה־ <WH4100> mah- what הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh; these וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar thou not what these be;And I said לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo No אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> 'a-do-Ni. No my lord

וַיַּ֜עַן <WH6030> vai-Ya-'an Then he answered וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and spake אֵלַי֙ <WH413> 'e-Lai about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, unto me saying זֶ֚ה <WH2088> zeh This דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- This [is] the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <WH2216> ze-rub-ba-Vel unto Zerubbabel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo nor בְחַ֙יִל֙ <WH2428> ve-Cha-yil Not by might וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor בְכֹ֔חַ <WH3581> ve-Cho-ach, nor by power כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- but בְּרוּחִ֔י <WH7307> be-ru-Chi, but by my spirit אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> tze-va-'ot. of hosts

מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- What אַתָּ֧ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you הַֽר־ <WH2022> har- hill הַגָּד֛וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol Who [art] thou O great לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei accept זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <WH2216> ze-rub-ba-Vel Zerubbabel לְמִישֹׁ֑ר <WH4334> le-mi-Shor; [thou shalt become] a plain וְהוֹצִיא֙ <WH3318> ve-ho-Tzi and he shall bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> ha-'E-ven stone הָרֹאשָׁ֔ה <WH7222> ha-ro-Shah, the top תְּשֻׁא֕וֹת <WH8663> te-shu-'ot [thereof with] shoutings חֵ֥ן <WH2580> chen [crying] Grace חֵ֖ן <WH2580> chen grace לָֽהּ׃ <WH99999> Lah. פ Peh
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> ye-Dei The hands זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <WH2216> ze-rub-ba-Vel, of Zerubbabel יִסְּד֛וּ <WH3248> yis-se-Du foundation הַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> hab-Ba-yit of this house הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh of this וְיָדָ֣יו <WH3027> ve-ya-Dav his hands תְּבַצַּ֑עְנָה <WH1214> te-vatz-Tza'-nah; shall also finish וְיָ֣דַעְתָּ֔ <WH3045> ve-Ya-da'-ta, it and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <WH7971> she-la-Cha-ni hath sent אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem. about

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki For מִ֣י <WH4310> mi who בַז֮ <WH937> vaz contempt לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> le-Yom the day קְטַנּוֹת֒ <WH6996> ke-tan-nOt of small וְשָׂמְח֗וּ <WH8055> ve-sa-me-Chu, will be glad וְרָא֞וּ <WH7200> ve-ra-'U and shall see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֶ֧בֶן <WH68> ha-'E-ven stones הַבְּדִ֛יל <WH913> hab-be-Dil plummet בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> be-Yad in the hand זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <WH2216> ze-rub-ba-Vel of Zerubbabel שִׁבְעָה־ <WH7651> shiv-'ah- [with] those seven אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh; another עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> 'ei-Nei they [are] the eyes יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah which מְשׁוֹטְטִ֖ים <WH7751> me-shot-Tim which run to and fro בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol throughout הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. through the whole earth

וָאַ֖עַן <WH6030> va-'A-'an Then answered וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar I and said אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> 'e-Lav; to him מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What שְּׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> she-Nei unto him What [are] these two הַזֵּיתִים֙ <WH2132> haz-zei-Tim olive trees הָאֵ֔לֶה <WH428> ha-'E-leh, are these עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on יְמִ֥ין <WH3225> ye-Min upon the right הַמְּנוֹרָ֖ה <WH4501> ham-me-no-Rah [side] of the candlestick וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and upon שְׂמֹאולָֽהּ׃ <WH8040> se-mo-Lah. and upon the left

וָאַ֣עַן <WH6030> va-'A-'an And I answered שֵׁנִ֔ית <WH8145> she-Nit, again וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar and said אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> 'e-Lav; to him מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What שְׁתֵּ֞י <WH8147> she-Tei unto him What [be these] two שִׁבֲּלֵ֣י <WH7641> shib-ba-Lei branches הַזֵּיתִ֗ים <WH2132> haz-zei-Tim, olive אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּיַ֗ד <WH3027> be-Yad, which through שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> she-Nei the two צַנְתְּר֣וֹת <WH6804> tzan-te-Rot pipes הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> haz-za-Hav, golden הַֽמְרִיקִ֥ים <WH7324> ham-ri-Kim empty מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> me-'a-lei-Hem and הַזָּהָֽב׃ <WH2091> haz-za-Hav. the golden

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he answered אֵלַי֙ <WH413> 'e-Lai about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, me and said הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo No יָדַ֖עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ta Knowest מָה־ <WH4100> mah- what אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh; these וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar thou not what these [be];And I said לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo No אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> 'a-do-Ni. No my lord

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> she-Nei he These [are] the two בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- ones הַיִּצְהָ֑ר <WH3323> hai-yitz-Har; anointed הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> ha-'o-me-Dim that stand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by אֲד֥וֹן <WH113> a-Don by the Lord כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the whole earth
